TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MtpDevice extends Java.Lang.Object
Public NotInheritable Class MtpDevice Inherits Object
public ref class MtpDevice sealed : Java::Lang::Object

Docs.summary: This class represents an MTP or PTP device connected on the USB host bus.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetPartialObject (int objectHandle, long offset, long size, byte[] buffer);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 GetPartialObject(int32 objectHandle, int64 offset, int64 size, unsigned int8[] buffer) cil managed
Public Function GetPartialObject (objectHandle As Integer, offset As Long, size As Long, buffer As Byte()) As Long
public: long GetPartialObject(int objectHandle, long offset, long size, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer);
member this.GetPartialObject : int * int64 * int64 * byte[] -> int64

Docs.param: handle of the object to read
Start index of reading range. It must be a non-negative value at most 0xffffffff.
Size of reading range. It must be a non-negative value at most Integer.MAX_VALUE or 0xffffffff. If 0xffffffff is specified, the method obtains the full bytes of object.
Array to write data.
Docs.summary: Obtains object bytes in the specified range and writes it to an array.
Docs.returns: Size of bytes that are actually read.

format.a: Java documentation for android.mtp.MtpDevice.getPartialObject(int, long, long, byte[]).
